      • RandomSplitTable

        public DataTable[] RandomSplitTable(DataTable dataTable,
                                    double splitRatio)
        RandomSplitTable takes in a dataTable and randomly split it into two according to the splitRatio which the exact number of rows for one of the splitted dataTable is (lowerbound)splitRatio*numRows.
        Parameters:
        dataTable - - the input dataTable for processing
        splitRatio - - the splitRatio
        Returns:
        splitedTables - a DataTable array with splitted dataTable with the first element has the one specific by the splitRatio
